Latest News

Perez DNF's at AustralianGP

Sergio Perez, the Mexican racing driver for Red Bull Racing, suffered a heartbreaking DNF (did not finish) at the season-opening Australian Grand Prix. Perez, who was starting his first race for Red Bull, was looking to make an immediate impact on the team after his switch from Racing Point (now Aston Martin).

Hamilton Stays at Mercedes

In a surprising turn of events, the seven-time Formula One World Champion, Lewis Hamilton, has announced that he will be staying with Mercedes for the upcoming 2023 season. This announcement comes after months of speculation regarding Hamilton's future in the sport. Many had speculated that he might retire or move to another team, but it seems that the lure of another championship with Mercedes was too strong for him to resist.
